text: duniya mein logon ko unakee maragoob cheeze (masalan) beeviyon aur beton aur sone chodee ke bade bade lage hue dheron aur umda umda ghodon aur maveshiyon or khetee ke saath ulafat bhalee karake dikha dee gaee hai ye sab dunayaavee zindagee ke (chand roza) faayade hain aur (hamesha ka) achchha thikaana to khuda hee ke yaho hai
